description.displayText: Rosie is a wonderful, caring, funny, engaging and active person. I highly recommend her for any discerning family who wants someone reliable and intelligent. Not many caregivers would know the value of organic foods, the value of nutrients in what we eat, or homeopathic remedies for what ails you. Rosie knows it all. Communicate clearly with her, and you will have a wonderful addition to your household.
description.originalText: Rosie is a wonderful, caring, funny, engaging and active person. I highly recommend her for any discerning family who wants someone reliable and intelligent. Not many caregivers would know the value of organic foods, the value of nutrients in what we eat, or homeopathic remedies for what ails you. Rosie knows it all. description.displayText: Cruz (Rosie) is wonderful!  She sincerely loved my children and took such good care of them.  Rosie has a generous and loving heart--such a warm and caring person.  Not only did she keep my children active (trips to the zoo, playgrounds, parks, and museums), engaged, safe and happy, but she was a very good friend to me, as well.  We miss Rosie but know that she will always be part of our family.  I wholeheartedly recommend Rosie and am happy to serve as a reference for her.

description.displayText: Rosie was an absolutely wonderful caregiver for my three children.  She cared for them as if they were her own--very involved in their development, making sure they were well-mannered, well-fed, engaged and active.  It was heartbreaking when our family moved and could no longer have Rosie as a part of our family but the family who gets her next is so very lucky.  I recommend Rosie without reservation--she is caring, warm, active, funny and attentive--a truly lovely person.
